#summary Build instructions.
#labels Featured

= Dependencies =
== For deb systems ==
 * libgtk2.0-dev
 * libdbus-glib-1-dev
 * libglade2-dev
 * libcurl3-dev
== For rpm systems ==
 * libgtk2.0-devel
 * libdbus-glib-1-devel
 * libcurl3-devel
 * libglade2-devel

= Download sources =
== Check out from svn ==
{{{
svn checkout http://osd-lyrics.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ osd-lyrics
}}}
== Download source package ==
You can get source packages from [http://code.google.com/p/osd-lyrics/downloads/list]

= Build and install =
Make sure you are in the source directory, which is typically named osd-lyrics.
Then follow the instructions:
{{{
aclocal
autoconf
automake --add-missing
./configure
make
sudo make-install
}}}
